# nibBundle

**Instance Property**

The nib bundle to be loaded to instantiate the receiver’s primary view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var nibBundle: Bundle? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property’s value is the bundle you provide to the `nibBundleOrNil` parameter in the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSViewController/init(nibName:bundle:)] method.

## Nib Properties

- **nibName**: The name of the nib file to be loaded to instantiate the receiver’s primary view.
